createnotificationrule.name: CreateNotificationRule
createnotificationrule.description: Grants permission to create a notification rule for a resource

deletenotificationrule.name: DeleteNotificationRule
deletenotificationrule.description: Grants permission to delete a notification rule for a resource

deletetarget.name: DeleteTarget
deletetarget.description: Grants permission to delete a target for a notification rule

describenotificationrule.name: DescribeNotificationRule
describenotificationrule.description: Grants permission to get information about a notification rule

listeventtypes.name: ListEventTypes
listeventtypes.description: Grants permission to list notifications event types

listnotificationrules.name: ListNotificationRules
listnotificationrules.description: Grants permission to list notification rules in an AWS account

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list the tags attached to a notification rule resource ARN

listtargets.name: ListTargets
listtargets.description: Grants permission to list the notification rule targets for an AWS account

subscribe.name: Subscribe
subscribe.description: Grants permission to create an association between a notification rule and an Amazon SNS topic

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to attach resource tags to a notification rule resource ARN

unsubscribe.name: Unsubscribe
unsubscribe.description: Grants permission to remove an association between a notification rule and an Amazon SNS topic

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to disassociate resource tags from a notification rule resource ARN

updatenotificationrule.name: UpdateNotificationRule
updatenotificationrule.description: Grants permission to change a notification rule for a resource
